title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act (UCCJEA) Forms, UCCJEA-4 - Notice of hearing for order of custody or visitation or modification or enforcement of order of custody or visitation - UCCJEA
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act (UCCJEA) Forms, UCCJEA-4 - Notice of hearing for order of custody or visitation or modification or enforcement of order of custody or visitation - UCCJEA
State Regulations
DRL ยง 75-g Form UCCJEA-4
(Notice of Hearing for Order
of Custody or Visitation or for

Modification or Enforcement
of Order of Custody or

Visitation--UCCJEA)
8/2002
________
In the Matter of a Proceeding for

Custody Visitation under the Uniform Child

Custody

Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act
[Domestic Relations Law Art. 5-A] Docket

No. NOTICE OF HEARING
CUSTODY
VISITATION
MODIFICATION OF ORDER
ENFORCEMENT OF ORDER
--UCCJEA
Petitioner
-against-
Respondent
________
TO [specify name and address]: PLEASE TAKE NOTICE that: A petition has been filed in this Court
for [check applicable box(es)]: An Order of Custody

An Order of Visitation

Modification of and Order of Custody

Visitation

Enforcement of an Order of Custody

Visitation

This petition concerns the following
child(ren): Name(s) Date(s) of Birth

You will be given an opportunity to be
heard concerning the issues in this petition at a hearing, which will be held
on [specify date and time]: at [specify Court, Court part and address]: If you reside outside of the State of New

York, you may apply to testify by telephone, audio-visual means or other
electronic means by submitting the enclosed Electronic Testimony Application, Form UCCJEA-7, not less than three days before the above hearing date to
[specify address and fax number of Court]: ______________
Clerk of Court

Dated: Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Uniform Child

Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act (UCCJEA) Forms, UCCJEA-4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
